free: #e This dog was looking at that frog.
#c 這隻狗看著青蛙。
#e The child was looking intently at the dog.
#c 小孩一直看著狗。
#e The child was looking at the frog.
#c 小孩看著青蛙。
#e The frog came out.
#c 青蛙跑了出來。
#e The child went to sleep.
#c 小孩去睡覺。
#e These were his clothes.
#c 他的衣服。
#e These were his shoes too.
#c 也有他的鞋子。
#e His shoes were here ...
#c 他的鞋子在這裡 ...
#e When he woke up, he couldn't find the frog in the container.
#c 當他起來後,他找不到青蛙。
#e The clothes were scattered all over the floor.
#c 衣服散佈在地上。
#e The child took his what-is-it and lifted it up.
#c 小孩拿起什麼,舉起來。
#e The dog was still watching and stuck (its head) into the container where the frog had been, but it saw that the frog was not there.
#c 狗還在看,把頭塞到養青蛙的瓶子裡,可是沒看到青蛙。
#e (It) was gone.
#c 不見了。
#e Its head was still stuck inside the bottle.
#c 他的頭還是卡在裝水的地方。
#e The child opened the window.
#c 小孩打開窗戶。
#e And called out (the window). (The frog) will know by his calling.
#c 他叫,青蛙會知道。
#e The dog's head was still stuck inside the container.
#c 狗的頭還是卡在放水的地方。
#e The boy saw that there was nobody.
#c 小孩沒有看到人。
#e The bottle that was used to contain water broke.
#c 被用來放水的瓶子破了
#n 老師覺得應該是kapsa-ralom-an
#n Note: Informant feels the correct word should be 'kapsa-ralom-an.'
#e The dog was all right; the boy took him up and carried him.
#c 狗沒事,小孩拿起狗帶著他。
#e The child called out; the dog also barked along.
#c 小孩叫,狗也吠叫。
#e As the dog was barking, there were bees coming from the tree.
#c 狗在叫的時候,有蜂從樹那邊來。
#e The bees were hovering above while they kept on calling and the dog continued barking at the bees when it saw them (coming).
#c 當他們一直叫時,蜂在飛,狗繼續對蜂吠叫當他看到他們過來時。
#e The child knew the bees sting, and he bent down.
#c 小孩知道蜂會叮人,(所以)他就彎下。
#e The dog shook the tree with the beehive.
#c 狗搖有蜂窩的樹。
#e (After the dog) shook (the tree), the bees came out.
#c 搖了後,蜂跑出來了。
#e The child was afraid that the bees might bit him.
#c 小孩害怕蜂叮他
#n 老師覺得 '<in>aseng應改為 '<in>aseng-an: <pfv>bite-nmz. mam-tikot (tremble with fear)
#n Note: Informant feels '<in>aseng should be changed to '<in>aseng-an, pfv-bite-nmz.
#e He kept quiet.
#c 他很安靜。
#e A mouse came out and saw what happened.
#c 老鼠跑出來,看到什麼。
#e (The dog continued to) shake (the tree), and the beehive fell down.
#c (狗)繼續搖樹,蜂窩掉了下來。
#e The bees all came out.
#c 蜂全出來了。
#e The mouse also got out.
#c 老鼠也出來了。
#e It wanted to shoo away the...
#c 想要趕走 ...
#e The child went to hide up the hole in the tree.
#c 小孩去躲在樹洞裡。
#e He went toward the hole in the tree.
#c 他走向樹洞。
#e The child, seeing the owl, fell down.
#c 小孩看到貓頭鷹,掉下去了。
#e The owl came out.
#c 貓頭鷹出來了。
#e The bees chased the dog and it ran away.
#c 蜂追狗,然後離開了。
#e The bees were stinging the dog, and it ran away.
#c 蜂叮狗,然後離開了。
#e The owl flew (away).
#c 貓頭鷹飛。
#e The child got surprised.
#c 小孩嚇到了。
#e He got on top of the rock and called there.
#c 他來到石頭上,在那裡叫。
#e He did not know the deer was coming.
#c 他不知道鹿來了
#n 老師覺得聽不清楚的地方應為:
#n Note: Informant feels inaudible portion should be:
#n okik ra:am-i hini'
#n neg know-pf this
#n 否定 知道-受焦 這個
#e The child rode on top of the deer.
#c 小孩騎在鹿上。
#e He rode on top of the deer.
#c 他騎在鹿上。
#e Together with the dog, the deer left.
#c 鹿和狗一起離開了。
#e Then it suddenly ran away toward the cliff.
#c 他突然亂跑到懸崖邊。
#n IU#127 老師覺得聽不清楚的地方應為nak'ino'a: how.
#n Note: Informant feels inaudible portion should be nak 'ino' a: 'how'
#e The child and the dog did not know (where they were) and were frightened; the deer stopped and they fell off the cliff.
#c 小孩和狗不知道(他們在哪裡),很害怕;鹿停了下來,他門掉到懸崖下。
#e The dog fell heavily and fell together with the child.
#c 狗也重重地一起掉下去。
#e There were many trees above the cliff.
#c 在懸崖上有很多樹。
#e The deer was on top of the cliff watching the boy and the dog fall down.
#c 當小孩和狗掉下去時,鹿在上面看。
#e They fell down below.
#c 他們掉到下面。
#e They swam in the water.
#c 他們在水裡游泳。
#e The boy took the dog and carried it up. He made it swim.
#c 小孩拿著狗帶著他,使他游泳。
#e There was a piece of wood.
#c 有一根木頭。
#e They went to the side and saw a hole in the piece of wood.
#c 他們走去邊邊,看到樹裡有一個洞。
#e They went over the top of the piece of dead wood.
#c 他們走到枯木的上面。
#e They climbed over the top of the dead wood and saw two frogs below.
#c 他們爬過枯木的上面,看到兩隻青蛙。
#e The boy wanted to catch one frog.
#c 小孩想要抓青蛙。
#e Why did the frogs gather there.
#c 為什麼青蛙聚集在哪裡呢?
#e The dog barked.
#c 狗叫。
#e The child called out to the frog.
#c 小孩在叫青蛙。
#e There was his ... he took one frog.
#c 有他的 ... 他抓了一隻青蛙。
#e They were watching, and asked why he kept calling.
#c 他們一直看,為什麼一直叫?
#e The child took one frog away.
#c 小孩拿走一隻青蛙。
#e They were listening.
#c 他們在聽。
#e It's finished.
#c 沒有了。
